summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the proposed Charter Amendment contemplated by Resolution No. 25300 and submitting the same to the qualified electors (voters) of The City of Seattle at the general state election to be held therein on November 2, 1976; requiring the City Clerk to certify to the Director of the Department of Records and Elections of King County said proposed amendment in the form of specified ballot title and said amendment in full, and providing for publication thereof.
